Author: relapseandrecovery
Text: I exclusively buy from Aerie now because I want to support them and their sizes are pretty ranging too

Author: TacoinaToaster
Text: As someone who wears a 28 band (sometimes my ribs measure 27), the only place I can consistantly find stuff is online. Freya, curvy kate, etc are good for me but I need a larger cup than you so idk.   My breasts have changed size lately and it is so much effort to track down bras that fit me, send them back, buy more etc that I've solely worn sports bras for the last few months.
